definition.name: sumBT

text.english:
Let \( \texttt {sumBT} : BT_\mathbb{N} \to \mathbb{N} \) be defined as follows:
  • Base Clause: \( \texttt{sumBT}(\lambda) = 0 \)
  • Inductive Clause: \( \texttt{sumBT}(N(t_1,n,t_2)) = \texttt{sumBT}(t_1) + \texttt{sumBT}(t_2) + n \)
text.italiano:
Sia \( \texttt {sumBT} : BT_\mathbb{N} \to \mathbb{N} \) definita come segue:
  • Clausola Base: \( \texttt{sumBT}(\lambda) = 0 \)
  • Clausola Induttiva: \( \texttt{sumBT}(N(t_1,n,t_2)) = \texttt{sumBT}(t_1) + \texttt{sumBT}(t_2) + n \)

definition.coq: Fixpoint sumBT (t : btn) : nat := match t with | lmd => 0 | N t1 n t2  => sumBT t1 + sumBT t2 + n end.
